snippet: Verrazano survived a small stumble out of the gate to easily beat the field at the Tampa Bay Derby, helping solidify him as a legitimate Kentucky Derby favorite.
abstract: Verrazano, early Kentucky Derby favorite, wins Tampa Bay Derby in Oldsmar, Fla; other horse racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Verrazano survived a small stumble out of the gate to easily beat the field at the Tampa Bay Derby, helping solidify him as a legitimate Kentucky Derby favorite.

headline.main: Verrazano Cruises to Victory in Tampa Bay Derby
